item.title: Eye-Tracking in Practice: The EyeTrackR R Package and its Use in a Study on Human Postures
item.description: A presentation by Dr. Jürgen Symanzik presented to the Institute of Statistical Science, Academia Sinica, during 2018 Statistics Week in Taipei, Taiwan. More details to come.
